title: 12/01/21 DPS Hour 1 Rick Neuheisel
itunes:title: 12/01/21 DPS Hour 1 Rick Neuheisel
description:
Rick Neuheisel tells Dan that Brian Kelly is leaving Notre Dame to recruit better offensive linemen. Rick Says that recruiting is the same reason Saban left Michigan St. to go to Alabama.
